main event: Two children observed a flying object resembling two inverted plates near Hamel, Minnesota on August 11, 1948.
interesting points: The object maneuvered around trees and shot up to a height of 30 feet,The boys described the object's color as dull gray and size as 2 feet wide and 1.5 feet thick,The object made a whistling noise when it ascended,One of the eyewitnesses was the children's father who reported the incident,Photographic and soil samples were taken from the area after the sighting.
sighted object: a dull gray object shaped like two inverted plates
